meanings.definition: Objects made of a hard, white, translucent ceramic material.
meanings.sent1: The shop displayed beautiful porcelains in the window.
meanings.sent2: She collected delicate porcelains from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter accidentally dropped the stack of porcelains, creating a loud crash.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as fragile as porcelains, easily breaking under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight illuminated the intricate designs of the porcelains, making them glow softly.

meanings.definition: The process of making objects from this material.
meanings.sent1: The art of creating porcelains requires patience and skill.
meanings.sent2: The factory specialized in the production of fine porcelains.
meanings.sent3: The students observed the intricate steps of crafting porcelains with fascination.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like the smooth clay used to mold porcelains.
meanings.sent5: The master artisan demonstrated the delicate techniques involved in shaping porcelains.

meanings.sent1: The elegant dinner set was made of exquisite porcelains.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a set of valuable porcelains from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the display of porcelains, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of porcelains added a touch of sophistication to the room.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased a rare collection of ancient porcelains from different dynasties.
